zh trans: 此功能将在小程序中启用
en trans: This Page Will Be Available In Mini App

zh trans: 此功能已被移入微信校园卡小程序中，请扫描以下小程序码获取微校校园卡小程序。
en trans: This function has been moved to our WeChat Miniprogram\
column4: please scan the Miniprogram Code below to get our WeChat Miniprogram.

zh trans: 您的宿舍的电马上就要用完了！
en trans: Your dorm will soon run out of electricity!

zh trans: 您可以点击这条消息进入小程序立即充值电费。\n如需关闭提醒或调整提醒阈值，也请在小程序中设置。
en trans: You can tap this message to top up the electricity fees now in the miniprogram.\nYou can also tune the settings there.

zh trans: 领取香港中文大学（深圳）微信校园卡
en trans: Obtain Your CUHK-Shenzhen WeChat Campus Card

zh trans: 请选择你在香港中文大学（深圳）的身份
en trans: Please choose your identity in CUHK-Shenzhen.

zh trans: 请务必正确选择您的身份。若选择错误，将无法正常激活微信校园卡。
en trans: Please make sure that you choose the right identity. You won't be able to activate the card if incorrect.
